fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is visited by a Neutral Killing role, an attacking Neutral Chaos role, or a member of the Mafia performing the factional Mafia kill, you will roleblock them and scare all of their visitors away.

- You will know if your target is attacked, and your target will know if they were protected.

- Your visits are always Astral, unless you stay at your own house.

- You may haunt your own house once.

- Ignores roleblock immunity
